mapper.select: SELECT w.worker_name,w.worker_salary,w.worker_money, IFNULL(SUM(h.send_water_count),0) as send_water_count, IFNULL(SUM(w.worker_money*h.send_water_count)+w.worker_salary , w.worker_salary) as final_salary FROM tb_worker w LEFT JOIN tb_history h on w.wid=h.worker_id GROUP BY w.wid ORDER BY final_salary DESC

SELECT w.worker_name,w.worker_salary,w.worker_money, IFNULL(SUM(h.send_water_count),0) as send_water_count, IFNULL(SUM(w.worker_money*h.send_water_count)+w.worker_salary , w.worker_salary) as final_salary FROM tb_worker w LEFT JOIN tb_history h on w.wid=h.worker_id where h.worker_id is null GROUP BY w.wid ORDER BY final_salary DESC
